title: I have put writing on Quora as my hobby on my resume. How do I answer when a recruiter asks, “How will your hobby help you in your job?” - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess you can say that may help with advertising by its uses (answering questions with a disclosed promotion to that business/organization)? If you’re unapproving to that then maybe you should put a different hobby on your resume that you know has a beneficial use during work. -Jose
